description: Mountain Crust is cooking up a scrumptious selection of pizzas, seasonal appetizers, fresh salads, and more, all served to you buffet-style out of Ole Blue- the restored 1955 Ford F-600 Truck that’s beautifully built to completion with a Mugnaini wood-fired oven. A couple of their delicious pizzas include... The Aspen Amanda- white truffle oil, fig chutney, prosciutto, goat cheese, and garnished with fresh arugulaCopper Mountain Chicken Pesto- freshly made basil pesto, grilled chicken, pine nuts, spinach, and grated parmesanFor this and much more, call on this talented crew and Old Blue to come cater your next event. Fundraisers, graduation parties, block parties, weddings & rehearsal dinners, you name it, you can trust Mountain Crust to be there firing up the best food for all your guests.
name: Mountain Crust
